ENU-POLY  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English 
Language not Literature in English and 
Mathematics and any three (3) subjects 
from the following 
Economics/Commerce,  
Business Methods,  
Principles of Accounts,  
Literature in English  
Geography  
Office Practice  
Government,  
Biology/Agricultural Science,  
Chemistry,  
Physics,  
History/Government  
Typewriting  Shorthand  
  
Mathematics and two  
(2)  of 
 Geography, 
Commerce,  
Government, Principles 
of Accounts and  
Economics.  
  
a) FEDPO-OKO, FEDPOILA, FEDPO -AIU, 
YABATECH, & IMT-ENU require Five (5) ‘O’ level 
credit passes at not more than two (2) sittings.  
FEDPO-AIU requires ‘O’ level credit pass in one 
Science subject.  
b) IBD-POLY, OSUNPOLY PH -POLY and OTEFE 
require five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes including 
English and Mathematics and any three (3) 
subjects from the course requirements at not more 
than two (2) sittings. PH-POLY excludes History.  
c) FEDPOFFA and OZORO require  ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics and 
Economics and one (1) of Commerce, Business 
Method, Bookkeeping, Accounts and Geography.  
d) LASPOTECH does not accept Literature in 
English as course requirement for Accountancy. It 
accepts History as UTME subject.  
e) OGWASHIUKU does not accept History but 
accepts Agricultural Science or Biology as course 
requirements.  
f) IMT-ENU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes.  
g) RAMATPOLY accepts certificate in Accountancy 
from any institution with four (4) subjects at pass 
level which must include English Language and 
Mathematics and any two (2) of the subjects listed 
in course requirement column  
h) FIDEIPOLY and IGBAJO require five (5) ‘O’ level 
credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Economics/Commerce and any other two (2) 
subjects from the following Business Method, 
Accounts, Geography, Government, Agricultural 
Science/Biology at not more than two (2) sittings.  
 
PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE AT THE NATIONAL DIPLOMA (ND) AND ENTRY REQUIREMENTS   
POLYTECHNIC/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  REMARKS/WAIVER
